snippet.title: New Ralin Update - Outdoor area
snippet.description:
After a long time of fixing issues, learning the new Unity5 features, handling meetings with partners and potential publishers and keeping the lights on, we are happy to show you a new update.

The new area is 2km * 2km big and we are working on the 3D assets and new features for the game.
